parameters.name: CateId
parameters.description: The ID of the video category.

parameters.name: CoverURL
parameters.description: The URL of the video thumbnail.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the video.

*   The value can be up to 1,024 bytes in length.
*   The string must be encoded in the UTF-8 format.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description:
The tags of the video.

*   Each tag can be up to 32 bytes in length. A maximum of 16 tags can be specified.
*   Separate multiple tags with commas (,).
*   The string must be encoded in the UTF-8 format.

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description:
The title of the video.

*   The value can be up to 128 bytes in length.
*   The string must be encoded in the UTF-8 format.
